column3: â€œI was told this was a good strain to smoke before going to the gym, and I have to agree.  I had he best ever shoulder workout after smoking this.  In between sets I would watch TV and would giggle at sports stars and America's Funniest Home Videos.  I was really easily able to target my deltoids, and especially rear delts, which can be hard for me to do usually.â€

â€œThis shit's amazing...it rivals Alaskan Thunderfuck in awesomeness and potency, minus the exhaustion that sets in after a serious ATF sesh. â€œFucking amazing.  VERY potent, and relatively clear-headed and alert high.  I'm in love.  The smoke reeks of cat/skunk piss though, so I would suggest vaping if you're paranoid about smells traveling.â€

â€œI suffer from acute and chronic pain : past history of GI cancer , Sugical intervention , spinal stenosis, and PTSD , GAD and anorexia nervosa (no fancy acronym for that) for these I medicate for.

â€œI was very excited to come across this. Ive had Super Sour Diesel and Super Silver Sour Haze. This may have been better. The first hit floored me, it was the strongest diesel flavor i had ever tasted. Piney diesel with a slight sour kerosene twist. The effects also floored me, Shooti...â€

â€œOk, where do I even start...
Like most of the other sativa strains, this one gives you a really, really dry mouth. When I first hit the blunt, I got lowkey dizzy and my head felt a little bit heavier. But after 2-3 min. my surrounding started to feel mich clearer. All the colors started to feel more intense, a very nice feeling. Would definitely recommened this for outdoor.â€

â€œThe very first thing I notice every time is the incredible taste; which isn't something I normally pay too much attention to.  It's fantastic! 

This is a great strain for day time use, particularly before exercising or locking yourself down with a project.  Super motivating and full of focus, even with the heavy head high you get, you're still getting shit done.  

In closing, this is what a Sativa should be all abo...â€

â€œNot sure if it was because of the quality I got from the dispensary or if it wasn't my thing but the strain was average. I love a good head high which I expected but it wasn't near that. Felt great overall but just didn't live up to the expectations I've heard about the strain. I'd give it another chance though being I'm not sure if it was the strain or my resources.â€
